highlights.title: Highlights of the Conference
points: Expert-led keynote presentations from renowned speakers in the field.
A diverse range of sessions covering theoretical aspects, practical applications, and computational techniques.
Networking opportunities to connect with fellow researchers and industry professionals.
A showcase of cutting-edge research and innovative solutions in scientific computing.
highlights.summary: Whether you're a researcher, educator, or industry expert, this conference is an invaluable opportunity to gain insights and contribute to the vibrant community of mathematicians and scientists dedicated to advancing the understanding of differential equations.

conferenceThemes.title: Conference Themes
conferenceThemes.description: The conference will cover a variety of topics, including but not limited to:
topics: Analytical and Numerical Methods for ODEs and PDEs
Controllability, Observability, and Stability of Differential Equations

workshopTheme.title: Workshop Theme
workshopTheme.description: This workshop is designed to introduce young researchers, doctoral students, and early-career faculty to the foundational and computational aspects of dynamical systems. The aim is to equip participants with knowledge of current methodologies, emerging trends, and research opportunities.
topics: Ordinary and Partial Differential Equations in Modeling
Applications in Biological Systems, Climate Models, and Control Theory
